sourcesContent:
<template>

<v-app>
      
      <v-form
        ref="form"
        v-model="valid"
        lazy-validation
      >
      <template>
    <v-data-table
      :headers="headers"
      :items="desserts"
      class="elevation-1"
    ></v-data-table>
  </template>
      <v-dialog
      v-model="dialog"
      >
      <template v-slot:activator="{on}">
        <v-btn
          v-on="on"> Click
        </v-btn>
        
      </template>
      
      <v-card-text class="white">
        <v-text-field
          v-model="name"
          :counter="10"
          :rules="nameRules"
          label="Name"
          required
        ></v-text-field>
    
        <v-text-field
          v-model="email"
          :rules="emailRules"
          label="E-mail"
          required
        ></v-text-field>
       <v-btn
          :disabled="!valid"
          color="success"
          class="mr-4"
          @click="validate"
        >
          Validate
        </v-btn>
      </v-card-text>
      </v-dialog>
       
      </v-form>
      </v-app>

  </template>

<script>
    export default {
      data:()=> ({
        valid: true,
        name: '',
        nameRules: [
          v => !!v || 'Name is required',
          v => (v && v.length <= 10) || 'Name must be less than 10 characters',
          v=>/^[a-zA-z]+$/.test(v)||'name is not valid'
      ],
          email:'',
        emailRules: [
          v => !!v || 'E-mail is required',
          v => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || 'E-mail must be valid',
        ],
      }),
      methods: {
        validate () {
          this.$refs.form.validate()
          const arr = {
            name : this.name,
            email : this.email,
          }
          console.log(JSON.stringify(arr))
        },
    
      },
     

    }
  </script>
